name: Dr. Jan Itor
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 50
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$288204/

----------------------

A heart transplant a day keeps the doctor away!

Play as the tireless Janitor in this campy Body Horror game.  He's been through many transplants, but his body rejects them all!

To fuel his need for more hearts, he took a job cleaning up behind the world's worst Hospital. There's plenty of hearts leftover to go around. But don't get caught taking one! And if you can't keep up your job performance, you'll lose access to them!

----------------------
Controls:
Move: WASD
Interact: E
Mop: Hold Spacebar

----------------------
